abstract: Growth of multimillion-dollar mansions built by Farrell Building, luxury-homes builder in Hamptons, NY, offers sign that local economy has rebounded since financial crisis; company owner Joe Farrell, who says he has more than 20 new homes under construction,  says he is making as much money as he did at market's peak in 2006.
lead_paragraph: There is no surer sign that the big-spending ways of the pre-financial crisis era have returned to the Hamptons than the similar looking mansions across the landscape.

headline.main: Hamptons McMansions Herald a Return of Excess
headline.print_headline: Hamptons McMansions Herald a Return of Excess

snippet: There is no surer sign that the big-spending ways of the pre-financial crisis era have returned to the Hamptons than the similar looking mansions across the landscape....
